member.name: T:StringExtensions.StringExtensions
member.summary: Contains utility methods for the class String.

member.name: M:StringExtensions.StringExtensions.ToMd5Hash(System.String)
member.summary: Take a string and encode it into a 128-bit fingerprint using the MD5 Hashing algorithm.
member.returns: The given string converted in MD5 Hash.

member.name: M:StringExtensions.StringExtensions.ToBoolean(System.String)
member.summary: Convert a key string words to a true boolean value.
member.param: The values can be: "true", "ok", "yes", "1" and "да". Otherwise it will display false.
member.returns: Returns true for the specific words.

member.name: M:StringExtensions.StringExtensions.ToShort(System.String)
member.summary: Convert a given short number written as a string into a short number.

member.name: M:StringExtensions.StringExtensions.ToInteger(System.String)
member.summary: Convert a given integer number written as a string into a integer number.

member.name: M:StringExtensions.StringExtensions.ToLong(System.String)
member.summary: Convert a given long number written as a string into a long number.

member.name: M:StringExtensions.StringExtensions.ToDateTime(System.String)
member.summary: Convert a given representation of date and time written as a string into its DateTime equivalent.

member.name: M:StringExtensions.StringExtensions.CapitalizeFirstLetter(System.String)
member.summary: Capitalize the first letter in a given string.
member.returns: Returns string with capital first letter.

member.name: M:StringExtensions.StringExtensions.GetStringBetween(System.String,System.String,System.String,System.Int32)
member.summary: Retrieves substring between two other substrings.
member.returns: The content between the startString and endString.

member.name: M:StringExtensions.StringExtensions.ConvertCyrillicToLatinLetters(System.String)
member.summary: Convert a word written with Cyrillic letters to a word written in Latin letters.

member.name: M:StringExtensions.StringExtensions.ConvertLatinToCyrillicKeyboard(System.String)
member.summary: Convert a word written with Latin letters to a word written in Cyrillic letters.

member.name: M:StringExtensions.StringExtensions.ToValidUsername(System.String)
member.summary: Converts a upper and lower Cyrillic characters to Latin and removes all other characters other than the symbols "_" and ".".
member.returns: String converted to a valid user name.

member.name: M:StringExtensions.StringExtensions.ToValidLatinFileName(System.String)
member.summary: Converts all upper and lower Cyrillic characters to Latin and removes all other characters other than the symbols "_", "." and "-".
member.returns: String converted to a valid file name.

member.name: M:StringExtensions.StringExtensions.GetFirstCharacters(System.String,System.Int32)
member.summary: Gets the first characters of a string.
member.param: The number of characters to extract.
member.returns: Returns a string with the extracted characters.

member.name: M:StringExtensions.StringExtensions.GetFileExtension(System.String)
member.summary: Retrieves the file extension of a file name.

member.name: M:StringExtensions.StringExtensions.ToByteArray(System.String)
member.summary: Convert all characters of a string into bytes.
member.returns: Array of bytes of character code.
